text: Since the early 2000s, China's mental health policies and strategies -notably the National Mental Health Plans released in 2002 and 2015 -have aimed to promote the development of the Chinese mental health system with respect to narrowing the treatment gap [19] . Each National Plan set specific goals relating to the awareness rate of mental health related knowledge among urban and rural residents [20] , leading to an increase in populationbased surveys and interventions for mental health related knowledge, attitudes and skills [21] [22] [23] .
